summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to expenditures for technology; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1998 budget of the Executive Services Department by reducing and reappropriating the expenditure allowance for the Reserve for Technology in the 1998 Finance General budget to support the hiring of a consultant to perform a Year 2000 progress audit; and providing exemption from Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 3.114, and authorizing the Executive Services Department to negotiate and execute an agreement for the aforementioned consulting services.
